backup.success:
You are connected.

disable.success: Double authentication by app is disabled

enable.success:
The double authentication by authentication app is configured. 
Follow the necessary steps to activate it

enableemail.success: Double email authentication is configured follow the steps necessary to activate it.

removecredential.success: The access key has been deleted

resendemail.success: A new code has been sent to your email address

setpreferredmethod.success: Your favorite double authentication method has been updated

status.error: Error when recovering active double authentication methods

verify.error: Error when checking the double authentication by application
verify.success: You can now use your app to connect

verifyemail.error: Error when checking the double authentication by email
verifyemail.success: Double email authentication is now activated

forgotpassword.success: A reset email was sent to your email address

login.notverifiedsuccess: A code has been sent to you to check your email address
